Jx.Field

Extends: Jx.Widget

This class is the base class for all form fields.

Example

Locale Keys
  • field.requiredText

Summary
Jx.FieldExtends: Jx.Widget
Options
idThe ID assigned to the container of the Jx.Field element, this is not the id of the input element (which is internally computed to be unique)
nameThe name of the field (used when submitting to the server). 
labelThe text that goes next to the field.
labelSeparatorA character to use as the separator between the label and the input. 
valueA default value to populate the field with.
taga string to use as the HTML of the tag element (default is a <span> element).
tipA string that will eventually serve as a tooltip for an input field. 
templateA string holding the template for the field.
containerClassa CSS class that will be added to the containing element.
labelClassa CSS to add to the label
fieldClassa CSS class to add to the input field
tagClassa CSS class to add to the tag field
requiredWhether the field is required. 
readonly{True|False} defaults to false. 
disabled{True|False} defaults to false. 
defaultAction{Boolean} defaults to false, if true and this field is a button of some kind (Jx.Button, a button or an input of type submit) then if the user hits the enter key on any field in the form except a textarea, this field will be activated as if clicked
Functions
render
setValueSets the value property of the field
getValueReturns the current value of the field.
resetSets the field back to the value passed in the original options
disableDisabled the field
enableEnables the field
addToOverrides default Jx.Widget AddTo() so that we can call .add() if adding to a Jx.Form or Jx.Fieldset object.
changeTextThis method should be overridden by subclasses. 



Options



id
The ID assigned to the container of the Jx.Field element, this is not the id of the input element (which is internally computed to be unique)



name
The name of the field (used when submitting to the server).  Will also be used for the name attribute of the field.



label
The text that goes next to the field.



labelSeparator
A character to use as the separator between the label and the input.  Make it an empty string for no separator.



value
A default value to populate the field with.



tag
a string to use as the HTML of the tag element (default is a <span> element).



tip
A string that will eventually serve as a tooltip for an input field.  Currently only implemented as OverText for text fields.



template
A string holding the template for the field.



containerClass
a CSS class that will be added to the containing element.



labelClass
a CSS to add to the label



fieldClass
a CSS class to add to the input field



tagClass
a CSS class to add to the tag field



required
Whether the field is required.  Setting this to true will trigger the addition of a “required” validator class and the form will not submit until it is filled in and validates provided that the plugin Jx.Plugin.Field.Validator has been added to this field.



readonly
{True|False} defaults to false.  Whether this field is readonly.



disabled
{True|False} defaults to false.  Whether this field is disabled.



defaultAction
{Boolean} defaults to false, if true and this field is a button of some kind (Jx.Button, a button or an input of type submit) then if the user hits the enter key on any field in the form except a textarea, this field will be activated as if clicked



Functions



render
render : function ()



setValue
setValue : function (v)
Sets the value property of the field
Parameters
vThe value to set the field to.



getValue
getValue : function ()
Returns the current value of the field.



reset
reset : function ()
Sets the field back to the value passed in the original options



disable
disable : function ()
Disabled the field



enable
enable : function ()
Enables the field



addTo
addTo: function(what,
where)
Overrides default Jx.Widget AddTo() so that we can call .add() if adding to a Jx.Form or Jx.Fieldset object.
Parameters
whatthe element or object to add this field to.
wherewhere in the object to place it.  Not valid if adding to Jx.Form or Jx.Fieldset.



changeText
changeText: function (lang)
This method should be overridden by subclasses.  It should be used to change any language specific default text that is used by the widget.
Parameters
langthe language being changed to or that had it’s data set of translations changed.









Base class for all widgets (visual classes) in the JxLib Framework. 
render : function ()
setValue : function (v)
Sets the value property of the field
getValue : function ()
Returns the current value of the field.
reset : function ()
Sets the field back to the value passed in the original options
disable : function ()
Disabled the field
enable : function ()
Enables the field
addTo: function(what,
where)
Overrides default Jx.Widget AddTo() so that we can call .add() if adding to a Jx.Form or Jx.Fieldset object.
changeText: function (lang)
This method should be overridden by subclasses.
